hero.name: Hi, I'm Michael
hero.description: I am a full-stack developer with 5 years of experience in developing web and mobile applications. I primarily use React for frontend development and Node.js for backend development. My expertise includes creating responsive and intuitive user interfaces and managing databases.

about.title: About
about.frontend_exp_desc: As a frontend developer, I specialize in creating responsive and highly optimized websites. My expertise lies in crafting intuitive user interfaces that enhance user experience and engagement.
about.backend_exp_desc: With a focus on backend development, I excel in building fast and efficient backend systems and APIs. I prioritize scalability and performance to ensure robust backend architecture that supports complex applications.
about.ui_exp_desc: As a UI designer, I have a strong portfolio of designing impactful landing pages and implementing comprehensive design systems. My approach blends aesthetics with usability, aiming to create visually appealing and user-friendly digital experiences.

experiences: Configured and developed solutions within Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
Ensured the maintenance, evolution, and optimal performance of implemented solutions.
Wrote deployment plans for solutions and effectively communicated them.
Documented the detailed implementation of CRM functionalities.

bellRandstad.organisation: Bell - Randstad, projet : CHU de Québec
experiences: Designed and implemented user interface tests using Telerik Test Studio.
Collaborated within an agile development team.
Developed front-end and back-end interfaces using React, Vue.js, or Angular.
Customized Drupal and WordPress themes to meet client needs.
Contributed to the technical community through knowledge sharing and documentation.
